channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Approximately just off the turning into Mapesbury Road from Willesden Lane NW6. Right on the side of the "Sleeping Policeman" bump., 23rd July
item.description:
Considerable size and unable to avoid your car sinking into it. Not noticeable to swerve and really deep so possible damage to cars. Rest of the road seems OK at the moment and I have not noticed before today.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapesbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeat offenders, 23rd July
item.description:
Everyone is fully aware of which residents are repeatedly dumping their rubbish and inviting mice. It can be easily be thrown in the bin. Please stop clearing it, let it pile up and maybe the inconsiderate residents might actually realise ???

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Marlborough Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signage no longer required as work complete., 23rd July
